items.title: Hit Points (HP)
items.content: Represent your character's health and stamina. When you take damage, you lose HP. When you reach 0 HP, you fall unconscious and must make death saving throws.

items.title: Temporary Hit Points
items.content: Extra health granted by spells and abilities, added onto current HP. Temporary HP do not stack; if you gain more, you can choose to keep existing Temp HP or swap for the new.

items.title: Short Rest (1 Hour)
items.content: Can roll available Hit Dice to restore Hit Points. You have 1 Hit Die per character level, the type is determined by your Class. Some abilities may restore after a short rest.

items.title: Long Rest (8 Hours)
items.content: Restores all HP, Spell Slots, Abilities, & can cure 1 level of exhaustion. Restores half of your maximum Hit Dice.
